name: Ignition72
tagline: Every Agency Has Their Speciality: Ours is Digital
description:
The internet and digital media have the potential to revolutionize almost every business, nonprofit or government agency. The challenge is to identify which technology to use and then create a plan to achieve the client's digital goals.
We develop, together with the client, a strategy to use digital technology to achieve these goals, and then implement it, test it, launch it, and measure it.
